channel.title: Chilled target can see its own trollbox
channel.description:
#### What happened? I was chilled by reaper as king and a fool trollboxed me, but I saw the trollboxed message myself.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Trollbox target is not supposed to see the trollboxed message
#### Steps to reproduce: Chill a target as reaper (I don't know if being Evil King matters or not here), then use the throllbox ability on the chilled target (don't know if it's different for Fool and Scorned). And the chilled target will see the trollboxed message in chat.
#### Comments: Here's the screenshot: https://i.imgur.com/GSs5ZVf.jpg
